verses.verse: And I saw<WG1492> an angel<WG32> come<WG2597> down<WG2597> from heaven,<WG3772> having<WG2192> the key<WG2807> of the bottomless<WG12> pit and a great<WG3173> chain<WG254> in his hand.<WG5495>
And he laid hold<WG2902> on the dragon,<WG1404> that old<WG744> serpent,<WG3789> which<WG3739> is the Devil,<WG1228> and Satan,<WG4567> and bound<WG1210> him a thousand<WG5507> years,<WG2094>

And cast<WG906> him into<WG1519> the bottomless<WG12> pit, and shut<WG2808> him up, and set<WG4972> a seal<WG4972> on him, that he should deceive<WG4105> the nations<WG1484> no<WG3361> more,<WG2089> till<WG891> the thousand<WG5507> years<WG2094> should be fulfilled:<WG5055> and after<WG3326> that he must<WG1163> be loosed<WG3089> a little<WG3398> season.<WG5550>

And I saw<WG1492> thrones,<WG2362> and they sat<WG2523> on them, and judgment<WG2917> was given<WG1325> to them: and I saw the souls<WG5590> of them that were beheaded<WG3990> for the witness<WG3141> of Jesus,<WG2424> and for the word<WG3056> of God,<WG2316> and which<WG3748> had not worshipped<WG4352> the beast,<WG2342> neither<WG3777> his image,<WG1504> neither<WG2532> <WG3756> had received<WG2983> his mark<WG5480> on their foreheads,<WG3359> or<WG2532> in their hands;<WG5495> and they lived<WG2198> and reigned<WG936> with Christ<WG5547> a thousand<WG5507> years.<WG2094>
But the rest<WG3062> of the dead<WG3498> lived<WG326> not again<WG326> until<WG2193> the thousand<WG5507> years<WG2094> were finished.<WG5055> This<WG3778> is the first<WG4413> resurrection.<WG386>

Blessed<WG3107> and holy<WG40> is he that has<WG2192> part<WG3313> in the first<WG4413> resurrection:<WG386> on<WG1909> such<WG5130> the second<WG1208> death<WG2288> has<WG2192> no<WG3756> power,<WG1849> but they shall be priests<WG2409> of God<WG2316> and of Christ,<WG5547> and shall reign<WG936> with him a thousand<WG5507> years.<WG2094>
And when<WG3752> the thousand<WG5507> years<WG2094> are expired,<WG5055> Satan<WG4567> shall be loosed<WG3089> out of his prison,<WG5438>

And shall go<WG1831> out to deceive<WG4105> the nations<WG1484> which<WG3588> are in the four<WG5064> quarters<WG1137> of the earth,<WG1093> Gog,<WG1136> and Magog,<WG3098> to gather<WG4863> them together<WG4863> to battle:<WG4171> the number<WG706> of whom<WG3739> is as the sand<WG285> of the sea.<WG2281>

And they went<WG305> up on<WG1909> the breadth<WG4114> of the earth,<WG1093> and compassed<WG2944> the camp<WG3925> of the saints<WG40> about,<WG2944> and the beloved<WG25> city:<WG4172> and fire<WG4442> came<WG2597> down<WG2597> from God<WG2316> out of heaven,<WG3772> and devoured<WG2719> them.

And the devil<WG1228> that deceived<WG4105> them was cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the lake<WG3041> of fire<WG4442> and brimstone,<WG2303> where<WG3699> the beast<WG2342> and the false<WG5578> prophet<WG5578> are, and shall be tormented<WG928> day<WG2250> and night<WG3571> for ever<WG165> and ever.<WG165>

And I saw<WG1492> a great<WG3173> white<WG3022> throne,<WG2362> and him that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> it, from whose<WG3739> face<WG4383> the earth<WG1093> and the heaven<WG3772> fled<WG5343> away; and there was found<WG2147> no<WG3756> place<WG5117> for them.

And I saw<WG1492> the dead,<WG3498> small<WG3398> and great,<WG3173> stand<WG2476> before<WG1799> God;<WG2316> and the books<WG975> were opened:<WG455> and another<WG243> book<WG976> was opened,<WG455> which<WG3739> is the book<WG976> of life:<WG2222> and the dead<WG3498> were judged<WG2919> out of those<WG3588> things which were written<WG1125> in the books,<WG975> according<WG2596> to their works.<WG2041>

And the sea<WG2281> gave<WG1325> up the dead<WG3498> which<WG3588> were in it; and death<WG2288> and hell<WG86> delivered<WG1325> up the dead<WG3498> which<WG3588> were in them: and they were judged<WG2919> every<WG1538> man according<WG2596> to their works.<WG2041>
And death<WG2288> and hell<WG86> were cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the lake<WG3041> of fire.<WG4442> This<WG3778> is the second<WG1208> death.<WG2288>
And whoever<WG1536> was not found<WG2147> written<WG1125> in the book<WG976> of life<WG2222> was cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the lake<WG3041> of fire.<WG4442>
